ctx: intros f a b lf M Hnorm Hint.
exceptions.tactic: apply (norm_RInt_le_const f a b lf M).
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R lf : V M : R Hnorm : forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> norm (f x) <= M Hint : is_RInt f a b lf Unable to unify "norm lf <= (b - a) * M" with "norm lf <= Rabs (b - a) * M".

original: intros f a b lf M Hnorm Hint. apply (norm_RInt_le_const f a b lf M). - apply Rminus_le_0. - auto. - auto.
